ISSUE.TITLE: OrderTotalCalculationService free shipping issue
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The following doesn't account for a cart that contains only freeshipping items AND non-ship-enabled items. So this: ``` if (cart.All(item => item.IsShipEnabled && item.IsFreeShipping)) return true; ``` should be updated to this: ``` if (cart.All(item => !item.IsShipEnabled || item.IsFreeShipping)) return true; ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Update "iTextSharp" third-party library to the latest version

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2504 Fxied an issue with free shipping. If you had a not shippable item in cart, and also had a product with free shipping in cart, shipping was still charged.
